name: The Broken Machine
description:
This game is a demo of the core gameplay of an upcoming game "The Broken Machine". You're facing the infinite assault  of multiples enemies. You have to use your light saber to deflect shots or cutting your enemies in half.

The Broken Machine

The "shards", are the part of a mighty entity known as the Machine. You wander around, trying to find these parts, so you can recover your ancient power.
